name: Dawn Chorus
description:
Dawn Chorus is a light-hearted, non-linear slice of life furry visual novel, which action takes place on a university trip to a guesthouse in the northern Norway. The story features nine different characters and branching routes with multiple choices. 

Take a part in a science camp in a remote guesthouse above the arctic circle, bond with your fellow classmates and explore the captivating Norwegian landscape in this new wholesome adventure.

The game is currently in development, with updates released monthly, with each update first being available to the patrons on Patreon on the second weekend of each month, then released to the public two weeks later.

If you would like to have access to the new updates on release, together with other benefits like sneak peeks or concept arts check out our Patreon here.

Our Twitter link: https://twitter.com/DawnChorusVN

Visual artist's page: https://twitter.com/hqtrashart

If you've enjoyed playing the demo, we'd be happy if you gave us a 5-star rating here :)
